* css
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: css
:END:
CSS parser / stringifier using
[[https://github.com/visionmedia/css-parse][css-parse]] and
[[https://github.com/visionmedia/css-stringify][css-stringify]].

** Installation
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: installation
:END:
#+begin_example
$ npm install css
#+end_example

** Example
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: example
:END:
js:

#+begin_src js
var css = require('css')
var obj = css.parse('tobi { name: "tobi" }')
css.stringify(obj);
#+end_src

object returned by =.parse()=:

#+begin_src json
{
  "stylesheet": {
    "rules": [
      {
        "selector": "tobi",
        "declarations": [
          {
            "property": "name",
            "value": "tobi"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
#+end_src

string returned by =.stringify(ast)=:

#+begin_src css
tobi {
  name: tobi;
}
#+end_src

string returned by =.stringify(ast, { compress: true })=:

#+begin_src css
tobi{name:tobi}
#+end_src
